response.original_title: i'm really scared i'm dying tbh
response.overview: An anxious young man convinces himself he may be dying after experiencing mysterious symptoms of panic. While looking for an anonymous outlet for his fears, he finds support in an unlikely place. I'M REALLY SCARED I'M DYING TBH is a silent film with a score recorded live at MAMA FARM in Bellport, New York in July 2024.
response.title: i'm really scared i'm dying tbh
